articles.title: ‘Help this brother’: Basketball stars hit back after Noah Lyles’ NBA jab - The Guardian
articles.description: Noah Lyles had a brilliant week at the World Athletics Championships but it’s safe to say that he’s not universally popular among his fellow US sports stars
articles.content: Noah Lyles had a brilliant week at the World Athletics Championships, winning gold in the 100m, 200m and 4x100m relay, but its safe to say that hes not universally popular among his fellow US sports … [+7000 chars]
